name: FeatureCardNineteen
description: Timeline feature section with full-width cards showing step numbers and rotated media.

description.example: Discover how we bring ideas to life

id.note: Numeric ID used to generate step number (01, 02, etc.)

description.example: We analyze market trends and user behavior to create strategies that drive real results.

imageSrc.note: Image source URL (either imageSrc or videoSrc)

videoSrc.note: Video source URL (either imageSrc or videoSrc)

propsSchema.features: Array<{ id: number, tag: string, title: string, subtitle: string, description: string, imageSrc?: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string, buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}> }> (required)
propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>

usageExample: <FeatureCardNineteen features={[{ id: 1, tag: 'Expertise', title: 'Strategy', subtitle: 'Data-driven decisions', description: 'We analyze market trends...', imageSrc: '/images/strategy.webp' }]} title="Our Process" description="Discover how we bring ideas to life" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground="noInvert" />
